episode.title: Double-Digit Domains
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Paul Kafasis returns to the show to talk about the iPhone 14 Pro, Apple Watch Ultra, AirPods Pro, and Rogue Amoeba’s 20th anniversary.
